Share.d:
HTTP API

This project exposes basic Tasker features as an HTTP API, as well as a few useful helper tasks.

Makes use of the new HTTP Request event in the latest Tasker Beta. Requires Tasker 6.2+

Built for use with the Tasker Home Assistant integration

Profiles

Profile Path Method Params/Body Response Description
GET Auth /api/auth GET None auth object Authorize connection and create API key
GET Auth /api/auth/refresh GET token: API key auth object Refresh an API key
GET Stats /api/stats GET None stats object Get statistics for Tasker
GET Profiles /api/profiles GET name: Name of profile (optional, repeated) profile objects Get a list of Tasker profiles
POST Profiles /api/profiles POST profile object(s) profile object(s) Set the status of Tasker profiles
GET Tasks /api/tasks GET name: Name of task (optional, repeated) task objects Get a list of Tasker tasks
POST Task /api/tasks POST task object Task return value Perform a Tasker task
GET Scenes /api/scenes GET name: Name of scene (optional, repeated) scene objects Get a list of Tasker scenes
POST Scenes /api/scenes POST scene object(s) scene object(s) Show/hide/destroy Tasker scenes
GET Globals /api/globals GET name: Name of global (optional, repeated) global objects Get a list of Tasker globals
POST Globals /api/globals POST global object(s) global object(s) Set the value of Tasker globals
GET Commands /api/commands GET clear: Clear the queue list of string Get a list of queued Tasker commands
POST Commands /api/commands POST list of string count: # of commands sent Send Tasker commands
POST Import /api/import POST Task XML task object Import a Tasker task
GET File /api/file/ GET None File data Get a file from the Tasker device
DELETE File /api/file/ DELETE None None Delete a file from the Tasker device
Queue Commands None None None None Queue all Tasker commands as a JSON array in the project variable %queued_command
Clear Voice Files None None None None Delete text and audio files from the Get Voice task once a week

Tasks

Task Parameter 1 Parameter 2 Return Description
Authorize Request Headers Request ID auth object Authorize an HTTP request by its 'Authorization' header
Builtin Globals 'friendly' or None None List of globals Helper task to get a list of builtin Globals, either variable names or friendly names
Device Info None None device info object Get the info of the device Tasker is installed on
Backup Google Drive Account Backup user variables backup object Backup the current Tasker config
Run Code Method (one of javascript, adb_wifi, shell, shell_root) Code to run Output of code Run arbitrary code
Get Voice Method to get voice (one of text, mp4, 3gpp, amr, amr-wb) Timeout Text or filename Get your voice, either with speech-to-text or the recording audio
Ping None None pong Simple task for testing connection

Global Variables

Variable Description
%DeviceInfo Cached return value of Device Info task

Project Variables

Variable Description
%queued_commands JSON array of all Tasker commands since last call to GET Commands
%authorize Authorize HTTP Requests (yes or no)
%api_keys Comma-seperated list of SHA1 digests of authorized API keys

JSON Objects

Auth

Field Type Description
key string API key
authorized bool Request was authorized

Stats

Field Type Description
active_profiles int # of active profiles
total_profiles int Total # of profiles
total_tasks int Total # of tasks
total_scenes int Total # of scenes
total_globals int Total # of user-defined globals
version string Tasker app version

Profile

Field Type Description
name string Name of the profile
enabled bool Profile is enabled
active bool Profile is active

Task

Field Type Description
name string Name of the task
running bool Task is running

Scene

Field Type Description
name string Name of the scene
status string Status of the scene
position (int, int) Position of the scene (x, y)
size (int, int) Size of the scene (w, h)

Global

Field Type Description
name string Name of the global
value string Base64 encoded value of the global

Device Info

Field Type Description
android_id string 64 bit hex value which should be constant for the life of the device
mac_address string Device MAC address (if available)
manufacturer string Device manufacturer
model string Device model
sw_version string Current app version

Action.Str:
Require device authentication (PIN, biometrics, etc.) in order to authorize API requests?
(default yes)

The 'HTTP Request' event is not available.

Action.Str:
Require authorization for API requests? API keys will be provided to each authorized client and the SHA1 digests will be stored in the project variable '\%api_keys'.
Include the 'Authorization: <api key>' header to authorize requests.
(default yes)
